name: verifyProjectDomain
description: Attempts to verify a project domain with `verified = false` by checking the correctness of the project domain's `verification` challenge.

idOrName.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

domain.description: The domain name you want to verify

teamId.description: The Team identifier or slug to perform the request on behalf of.

$ul: **verification**: A list of verification challenges, one of which must be completed to verify the domain for use on the project. After the challenge is complete `POST /projects/:idOrName/domains/:domain/verify` to verify the domain. Possible challenges: - If `verification.type = TXT` the `verification.domain` will be checked for a TXT record matching `verification.value`.
**verified**: `true` if the domain is verified for use with the project. If `false` it will not be used as an alias on this project until the challenge in `verification` is completed.
